parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and unexplained cracking of the windshield can cause a significant distraction to the driver, potentially leading to accidents, and may also compromise the structural integrity of the vehicle.
symptoms: The windshield cracks or shatters without any apparent reason
often starting from the edge or corner of the glass
and can spread rapidly. In some cases
the crack may appear overnight or while the vehicle is parked.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Sudden and unexplained windshield cracking can cause reduced visibility, increased risk of accidents, and potentially lead to more severe consequences, such as shattered windshields or compromised structural integrity.
symptoms: Windshield cracks or shatters without apparent reason
often starting from the edge or bottom of the windshield
and can spread rapidly. In some cases
the crack may be thin and hairline-like
while in others
it may be more pronounced.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the Thermo Control Valve can cause the malfunction of various safety and convenience features, including adaptive cruise control, lane-keeping, automatic braking, cabin heating, windshield defrost, and engine temperature monitoring. This can lead to reduced vehicle safety and drivability.
symptoms: Check engine light and other warning lights illuminate
indicating a problem with the Thermo Control Valve. The vehicle may experience issues with adaptive cruise control
lane-keeping
automatic braking
cabin heating
windshield defrost
and engine temperature monitoring.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Malfunctions of the infotainment system can cause distractions while driving, leading to increased risk of accidents. In some cases, the system may lock up or restart, causing inconvenience and potential safety hazards.
symptoms: The infotainment system locks up
restarts
or becomes unresponsive while driving
often causing distractions and inconvenience. In some cases
the system may malfunction while using navigation or Apple CarPlay.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the Thermo Control Valve can cause a short circuit, affecting all electrical components on its circuit, leading to the car becoming inoperable in traffic, and disabling driver assistance features such as lane assist, blind spot, and collision braking.
symptoms: The car becomes inoperable
all electrical components on its circuit are affected
driver assistance features are disabled.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The premature discharge of the battery can leave the driver stranded, unable to start the car, and may cause safety issues, especially in emergency situations.
symptoms: The battery discharges rapidly
the car is unable to start
the battery dies even when the car is turned off
the car shuts off while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Infotainment System and EyeSight System Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the infotainment system and EyeSight system can cause safety issues, especially when adaptive cruise control and lane keep assist are disabled, and can also cause inconvenience and annoyance.
symptoms: The infotainment system crashes
the touchscreen becomes unresponsive
the EyeSight safety system
adaptive cruise control
and reverse auto braking shut down
warning lights and errors appear on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch and window regulator can cause safety issues, especially in emergency situations, and can also cause inconvenience and annoyance.
symptoms: The clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
the clutch pedal sticks to the floor
the window regulator fails to raise and lower correctly and reliably.
